resource_dependency.userSessionSchema: Table: sessions(session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, user_id UUID REFERENCES users(id), token TEXT UNIQUE, expires_at TIMESTAMP)

function: Allow users to register and log in based on their roles (student or training provider)
static_description: A centered card with form fields for email and password. Below the form there are buttons labeled 'Login' and 'Register'. Background color is Azure (#F0FFFF) and buttons use Midnight Blue (#191970).

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Register' toggles visibility of additional registration-specific fields like name, confirm password, and role selection.
Submitting the login form sends credentials to the auth API endpoint and redirects authenticated user to respective dashboard.

resource_dependency.userProfileSchema: Table: user_profiles(user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, first_name VARCHAR(50), last_name VARCHAR(50), phone_number VARCHAR(20), address TEXT, date_of_birth DATE, qualifications JSONB, career_preferences JSONB)

function: Enable students to input and update personal details, qualifications, and career preferences
static_description: A vertical form layout containing editable text inputs for basic info, expandable sections for qualifications and career preferences, save/cancel buttons at bottom. Uses Azure background with Midnight Blue controls.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Save Changes' submits updated data via PUT request to the profile update API and displays success confirmation message.
Clicking 'Cancel' reverts unsaved changes back to previously saved values without sending a request.

resource_dependency.programMatchSchema: Table: program_matches(id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, student_id UUID REFERENCES users(id), program_id UUID REFERENCES training_programs(id), match_score DECIMAL, created_at TIMESTAMP)
resource_dependency.applicationStatusSchema: Table: applications(student_id UUID REFERENCES users(id), program_id UUID REFERENCES training_programs(id), status ENUM('pending','accepted','rejected'), applied_at TIMESTAMP)

function: Provide students with a centralized overview of matched training programs and current application statuses
static_description: Two side-by-side panels showing lists of matched programs and pending/recent applications. Each item includes title, brief description, institution name, and relevant status indicators. Azure background with Midnight Blue accents.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a program navigates to its detailed view page.
Hovering over items highlights them and shows tooltips with more context about match scores or deadlines.

resource_dependency.matchingAlgorithmLogic: Filters candidates by qualification level, geographic proximity, study area alignment, and interest compatibility using weighted scoring system.
resource_dependency.matchingCriteriaSchema: Table: matching_criteria(criteria_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, category VARCHAR(50), weight INT, description TEXT)

function: Generate personalized recommendations for training programs aligned with student attributes and preferences
static_description: Hidden logic executed server-side upon triggering event such as profile updates. No visible UI element but affects displayed content on student dashboards.

resource_dependency.applicationSubmissionSchema: Table: applications(student_id UUID REFERENCES users(id), program_id UUID REFERENCES training_programs(id), submitted_data JSONB, submission_date TIMESTAMP)

function: Allow students to submit applications directly through an easy-to-use interface linked from program listings
static_description: Prominent 'Apply Now' button within each program listing card. Clicking opens modal dialog displaying full program details alongside simplified application form requiring minimal extra information beyond existing profile data.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Apply Now' opens a modal window pre-filled with available student information ready for review before final submission.
Clicking 'Submit Application' sends collected data to backend endpoint which records the application entry and returns confirmation feedback.

resource_dependency.trainingProgramSchema: Table: training_programs(program_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, provider_id UUID REFERENCES users(id), title VARCHAR(100), description TEXT, location VARCHAR(100), field_of_study VARCHAR(50))

function: Offer training providers tools to publish, modify, and monitor their educational offerings along with access to compatible student profiles
static_description: Tabbed navigation panel switching between 'My Programs' and 'Matched Students'. 'My Programs' tab displays sortable table of owned listings; 'Matched Students' shows filtered list of prospective applicants matching set criteria. Azure theme maintained throughout.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking '+' icon allows creation of new program listing via popup form.
Selecting a student row reveals summary stats and contact options beneath it.

resource_dependency.studentSearchIndexSchema: Table: student_search_index(student_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, qualifications TEXT[], location POINT, interests TEXT[], searchable BOOLEAN)

function: Empower training providers to discover suitable students efficiently using customizable filters
static_description: Left sidebar with collapsible filter categories offering checkboxes/dropdown menus for narrowing results. Right pane shows filtered student cards arranged in grid format. Clear visual distinction between active/inactive filters.

interaction_and_states.description: Toggling any filter option dynamically reloads student list by calling search API with updated parameters.
Pressing 'Reset Filters' clears all selections and restores original unfiltered dataset display.

resource_dependency.messageThreadUI: Real-time chat-like interface supporting threaded conversations initiated either by student or provider.
resource_dependency.messagingSchema: Table: messages(message_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, sender_id UUID REFERENCES users(id), recipient_id UUID REFERENCES users(id), content TEXT, timestamp TIMESTAMP, read_status BOOLEAN)

function: Facilitate secure communication channels enabling direct engagement between enrolled students and participating institutions
static_description: Sidebar listing recent chats sorted chronologically. Main panel shows conversation history with typing indicator when recipient is online. Message input area below with send button. Consistent styling with Azure/Midnight Blue palette.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a chat thread loads complete message exchange between parties into main viewing area.
Typing and hitting 'Send' transmits message instantly while updating both participantsâ€™ views simultaneously.

static_description: Fluid layouts adjusting gracefully under various viewport dimensions. Uniform color scheme featuring light Azure backdrop complemented by rich Midnight Blue highlights enhancing readability and focus areas.
